questions.quote: I ran out of butter so I had to borrow yours. Anything else, Mr. Nosy?

You sure you don't want me to take my clothes off?  I'll do it!
He was in Chicago, the flight was overbooked, wouldn't let him on the plane. He kept screaming how he had to get to Madison Square Garden.
I know. Somebody around here has been giving Wilhelm the impression that I have been slacking off.

So you're so grateful to have sex, that you'll just shout out anything that comes into your head.
